biotools.summary: Computational method for decomposition of heterogeneous DNA methylomes. It applies matrix factorization with biologically motivated constratints and regularization to discover and quantify latent components in methylomes of multi-cellual samples.

bioschemas.name: MeDeCom
bioschemas.summary: Computational method for decomposition of heterogeneous DNA methylomes. It applies matrix factorization with biologically motivated constratints and regularization to discover and quantify latent components in methylomes of multi-cellual samples.
